org.sd.xml
Interface XmlTextRipperFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
PatternFinderFunction, RegexXtrFunction, XtrVisitorFunction
public interface XmlTextRipperFunction

Interface for hooks to be run during xml text ripper iteration. See the MultiFunctionTextRipper class for how this is used.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 void runDoneHook(XmlTextRipper xtr)
          Hook to be run after iteration through the ripper is complete.
 boolean runNextHook(java.lang.String text, XmlTextRipper xtr)
          Hook to be run after each 'next' result is returned from the ripper.
 

Method Detail

runNextHook

boolean runNextHook(java.lang.String text,
                    XmlTextRipper xtr)
Hook to be run after each 'next' result is returned from the ripper.

Returns:
true to continue iteration; false to halt iteration.

runDoneHook

void runDoneHook(XmlTextRipper xtr)
Hook to be run after iteration through the ripper is complete.

Note that this is only called by a MultiFunctionTextRipper when execution continues until the end; that is, when no function returns false during 'execute'.
